body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, this is James Robinson from Vincenzo's Benzos. May I know whom I have the pleasure of speaking with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi James, this is Denise Ross.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Denise! How can I assist you today with our car services or inventory?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in learning more about your financing options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Of course, Denise. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your zip code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one nine zero zero four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that. Also, could you let me know your preferred contact number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, it's six one zero five five five two one two one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect, Denise. We have some great financing options that I think will suit your needs. Thank you for your time. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, James. I appreciate your help!

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Denise. Have a wonderful day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is James Robinson and the customer's name is Denise Ross.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
